channel.title: Anyway to make all npcs drop random items?
channel.description: Is there anyway to make all npc's no matter wat lvl.. no matter were.. every npc in my game to random drop. I have alot of npcs and i wana know if there is anyway to make them randomly drop random items. I checked tuts and i only found single drops.. Please someone let me know. Thanks alot =D[br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2007, 06:02:31 PM[/size][hr]pls some 1 help
